name: games-of-life
description: is a Mathematical solution to any Game of Life variation

scripts.build: npm test && npm run browserify && npm run minify && npm run jekyll; git status
scripts.browserify: for x in demo dist; do npm run browserify_$x; done
scripts.browserify_demo: NODE_ENV=production NODE_PATH=src browserify demo/hexagonal/index.js -t babelify -o docs/js/demo-hexagonal.js
scripts.docs_data: npm run docs_data_package.json; npm run docs_data_tags.json
scripts.homepage:
echo "---
title: $npm_package_name
---" > docs/index.md; cat README.md >> docs/index.md
scripts.jekyll: npm run homepage; npm run generateDemoSVG npm run docs_data; cd docs; jekyll build; cd ..
scripts.lint: npm run lint_demo; npm run lint_src; npm run lint_test
scripts.lint_test: cd test; standard --global describe --global it; cd -
scripts.postversion: git push origin v${npm_package_version}; npm publish; npm run push
